sense.def:
The middle of something
je tisti del, ki je najbolj oddaljen od vseh robov, koncev ali zunanjih površin nečesa.

seg.quote: In the middle of the lawn was a great cedar tree.
He sat down in the middle of the front row.
...the white lines painted along the middle of the highway.
Test the meat to see if it is cooked in the middle.

sense.def:
V vrsti ali nizu je predmet ali človek
middle
, če je na obeh straneh ob njem ali pred njim in za njim enako število drugih predmetov ali ljudi.

seg.quote: ...the middle button of her black leather coat.
She was the middle child of the three.

sense.def:
One's middle
je sprednji del telesa v pasu.

seg.quote: He had a large green towel wrapped round his middle.

sense.def:
The middle of an event or period of time
je tisti del nekega dogodka ali obdobja, ki pride za prvim delom in pred zadnjim.

seg.quote: We landed at Canton in the middle of a torrential storm.
He was in his middle thirties.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
in the middle of doing something
, je zaposlen z določenim opravilom.

seg.quote: I'm in the middle of washing up.

sense.def:
Postopek ali pot, ki je
middle
, obstaja med dvema skrajnima nasprotjema.

seg.quote: Between Fascism or revolution there is a middle course.
